channel.title: How to change starting equipment and exp rate?
channel.description: hi, im currently working hard on my own server using the testscape source and was wondering how to change the starting equipment for a player and the amount of exp given for clicking hay bales/dummys etc.

item.title: How to change starting equipment and exp rate?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Fistey Mr Fistey
item.description:
@Mr_Fistey wrote:

to change starting items go into hybridscape and then into characters then into donttouch
then change this as you would like:

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 -1 0
character-equip = 1 -1 0
character-equip = 2 -1 0
character-equip = 3 -1 0
character-equip = 4 -1 0
character-equip = 5 -1 0
character-equip = 6 -1 0
character-equip = 7 -1 0
character-equip = 8 -1 0
character-equip = 9 -1 0
character-equip = 10 -1 0
character-equip = 11 -1 0
character-equip = 12 -1 0
character-equip = 13 -1 0

Read full topic
item.source: How to change starting equipment and exp rate?
